renderpass.code:
// color version of https://shadertoy.com/view/MfSfzd

#define rot(a)  mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))               // rotation 

#define A(v)   a = abs( q - vec3(1,-1,1) ),                /* arrow */        \
               v = max( max(a.x,a.y)-.95 , a.z-3.),                           \
               a = abs( vec3( vec2(q.x+q.z-3.2 , q.x-q.z+1.2 )*.7 , q.y+1.)), \
               t = min( t, v = min( v , max( max(a.x,a.y) -2. , max( a.z-.95 , 2.1-q.z )))), \
               q = q.yzx
                 
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,v1,v2,v3;
    vec3  R = iResolution, a,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -2.*R.y) - R ),          // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,15), q,                             // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5 :           // comment for no mouse cam
                 vec3( .15,.07,0) * cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); 
          
    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01 )         // march scene
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(-6.*M.y),                              // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-6.*M.x-1.57),
        A(v1), A(v2), A(v3),                               // arrows in the 3 directions
        p += t*D;                                          // step forward = dist to obj   
       

   O *= O * 1.1                                            // color scheme
          * vec4( t==v1, t==v2, t==v3, 1 );
}
